term.title: run bias

item.text: Contribution to measurement bias that is attributed to systematic effects on measurement results made in a single analytical run.

notes.item: Measurement bias in analytical chemistry may be considered to include run bias, laboratory bias, and measurement procedure bias.

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1015 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)
